Package it.polimi.vovarini.model.godcards

Class GodCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.vovarini.model.godcards.GodCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GodCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
The GodCard class represents a general GodCard game is the current game played by all the players name references one of the cards available in the base set of Santorini
Since:
0.1
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • normalNextPhaseFromStart

      public static Phase normalNextPhaseFromStart​(GameDataAccessor gameData)
      Computes the normal flow of the game from Phase.Start
      Parameters:
      gameData - is the Data of the game all players are currently playing
      Returns:
      Phase.Movement if the player selected one of his workers, Phase.Start if he did not

    • normalNextPhaseFromMovement

      public static Phase normalNextPhaseFromMovement​(GameDataAccessor gameData)
      Computes the normal flow of the game from Phase.Movement
      Parameters:
      gameData - is the Data of the game all players are currently playing
      Returns:
      Phase.Construction if the player's movementList is not empty, Phase.Movement otherwise

    • normalNextPhaseFromConstruction

      public static Phase normalNextPhaseFromConstruction​(GameDataAccessor gameData)
      Computes the normal flow of the game from Phase.Construction
      Parameters:
      gameData - is the Data of the game all players are currently playing
      Returns:
      Phase.End if the player's constructionList is not empty, Phase.Construction otherwise

    • normalNextPhaseFromEnd

      public static Phase normalNextPhaseFromEnd​(GameDataAccessor gameData)
      Computes the normal flow of the game from Phase.End
      Parameters:
      gameData - is the Data of the game all players are currently playing
      Returns:
      Phase.Start

    • computeReachablePoints

      public java.util.List<Point> computeReachablePoints()
      Function that computes a list of all the points where moving is possible
      Returns:
      a list of points that the player can reach from his currentWorker position

    • isMovementWinning

      public boolean isMovementWinning​(Movement movement)
      Function that computes if a player has won thanks to a valid movement he wants to perform
      Parameters:
      movement - is the movement move that the player wants to perform
      Returns:
      true if the movement allows the player to win, false otherwise

    • computeBuildablePoints

      public java.util.List<Point> computeBuildablePoints()
      Function that computes a list of all the points where building a block, independently by the level, is possible
      Returns:
      a list of points that the player can build upon from his currentWorker position

    • computeNextPhase

      public Phase computeNextPhase​(GameDataAccessor gameData)
      Method to compute the next phase you should go to
      Parameters:
      gameData - is the gameData all players are currently playing
      Returns:
      the phase subsequent to the one currently in place

    • computeNextPhase

      public Phase computeNextPhase​(GameDataAccessor gameData, boolean skipIfPossible)
      Computes the next phase based on the current game state.
      Parameters:
      gameData - An accessor for data pertaining to the game.
      skipIfPossible - If the player wants to skip an optional phase even though they could perform a move.
      Returns:
      the phase subsequent to the one currently in place

    • consequences

      public java.util.List<Movement> consequences​(Movement movement, GameDataAccessor gameData)
      This method computes the consequences of a specific action of a GodCard regarding movement
      Parameters:
      movement - is the Movement move the GodCard's owner wants to perform
      gameData - is the Data of the game all players are currently playing
      Returns:
      a list of Movements to perform sequentially to grant the correct application of the GodCard's own effect

    • consequences

      public java.util.List<Construction> consequences​(Construction construction, GameDataAccessor gameData)
      This method computes the consequences of a specific action of a GodCard regarding construction
      Parameters:
      construction - is the Movement move the GodCard's owner wants to perform
      gameData - is the Data of the game all players are currently playing
      Returns:
      a list of Constructions to perform sequentially to grant the correct application of the GodCard's own effect

    • validate

      public boolean validate​(java.util.List<Point> list, Movement movement)
      This method computes if a Movement move is valid when compared to the rules of the game
      Parameters:
      list - is a list of all the Reachable points the worker performing the movement can reach
      movement - is the Movement move the player wants to perform
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid, false otherwise

    • validate

      public boolean validate​(java.util.List<Point> list, Construction construction)
      This method computes if a Construction move is valid when compared to the rules of the game
      Parameters:
      list - is a list of all the Buildable points the worker performing the construction can reach
      construction - is the Construction move the player wants to perform
      Returns:
      true if the move is valid, false otherwise

      public GodName getName()
      Getter method for the GodCard's name
      Returns:
      the name of the GodCard (one of the values of the GodName enumeration)
